Class BuildingEstimator

Calculate an approximate shape of a building based on provided parameters.

Inheritance
System.Object
BuildingEstimator
Namespace: DUKE
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax
public static class BuildingEstimator

Methods

UpdateBuildingGrid(Building, Int32, Int32, Int32, BuildingZone, Int32, Int32, Int32, Int32, Single, Single)

Update the dimensions of _building.

Declaration
public static void UpdateBuildingGrid(Building _building, int _targetKWH, int _storyCount, int _constructionYear, BuildingZone _zone, int _startDepth = 12, int _maxDepth = 25, int _startLength = 0, int _maxLength = 100, float _storyHeight = 3F, float _airReplacementRate = 0.1F)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Building _building

The Building instance with updated dimensions.
System.Int32 _targetKWH

Given energy consumption the algorithm attempt to reach.
System.Int32 _storyCount

The number of stories.
System.Int32 _constructionYear

The year the Building was built. Used in determining the amount of energy lost through conduction.
BuildingZone _zone

Temperature zone of the Building. Used in determinining the average temperature.
System.Int32 _startDepth

Initial depth of the Building. Default value = 12m.
System.Int32 _maxDepth

Maxmimum allowed depth of the Building. Default value = 25m.
System.Int32 _startLength

Initial length of the Building. Default value = 0m.
System.Int32 _maxLength

Maximum allowed length of the Building Default value = 100m.
System.Single _storyHeight

The height of a single floor/story. Default value = 3m.
System.Single _airReplacementRate

The rate at which air is replaced. Default value = 0.1.
